member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.PgSqlCommand.CommandText
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL statement to execute against PostgreSQL.
member.value:
The SQL statement or stored procedure to execute. The default value is an empty string ("").
When working with overloaded stored procedures, use following syntax for executing specific overloaded routine: "StoredProcName:1" or "StoredProcName:5". First example executes first overloaded stored procedure, while second example executes fifth overloaded procedure. This notation affects only describing procedures when is .

member.name: P:Devart.Data.PostgreSql.PgSqlCommand.CommandTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating an attempt to execute a command and generating an error. Note that it is the time to wait for any server reply since the command was sent to a server, and it doesn't include the time necessary to fetch data if the command selects some data.
member.value: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute. The default value is 30. Not available under .NET Compact Framework.
